name: Jello Bubbles: Pop Color Balls
summary:
Play the new fun and addictive Jello Bubbles shooter game for FREE. Enjoy solving original bubble puzzles and relax popping colorful jelly balls.
Match 3 or more bubbles with the same color and clear levels, accomplish the game objective to advance to the next one.
Aim & shoot with the Jell-O-Matic Machine, to drop & blast all bubbles. A funny hummingbird helps you with nice boosters. Tap on the screen and drag the mini bubbles aim and lift it to shot. Take your time to aim and hit your desired bubble to make it pop.
Easy to learn, only aim, match, and pop all the balls in this fun color-matching adventure. Use your puzzle-solving skills to clear levels and unlock new cities around the world. Travel with our heroine and discover amazing monuments, from Barcelona to the world. Clean the Jello and save the kidnapped birds.
